name: Thunder Discharge
text: If you control an "Adventurer Token": You can target 1 monster you control equipped with an Equip Card that mentions "Adventurer Token"; destroy as many monsters your opponent controls as possible with ATK less than or equal to that monster, then you can equip 1 Equip Spell that mentions "Adventurer Token" from your hand or GY to 1 monster you control. You can only activate 1 "Thunder Discharge" per turn.
